aiml::cMatchLog

aiml::cMatchLog Struct Reference

This structure is used to hold the nodes of the tree that matched the user's input, that and topic. More...

Public Attributes

std::list< std::string > pattern
std::list< std::string > that
std::list< std::string > topic

Detailed Description

This structure is used to hold the nodes of the tree that matched the user's input, that and topic.

The lists hold one token (ie, a word with no spaces) of the corresponding match.
